00055 EuropaReactor::EuropaReactor(xml_arg_type arg)
00056   :TeleoReactor(arg, false), m_assembly(*this), m_core(*this), 
00057    m_filter(NULL) {
00058   bool found;
00059   std::string nddl;
00060   rapidxml::xml_node<> const &cfg = TeleoReactor::xml_factory::node(arg);
00061   rapidxml::xml_attribute<> const *model = cfg.first_attribute("model");
00062 
00063   if( NULL!=model ) {
00064     std::string file_name(model->value(), model->value_size());
00065     
00066     if( file_name.empty() )
00067       throw XmlError(cfg, "Attribute model is empty");
00068     nddl = manager().use(file_name, found);
00069     if( !found ) 
00070       throw XmlError(cfg, "Unable to locate model file \""+file_name+"\"");
00071   } else {
00072     std::string short_nddl = getName().str()+".nddl",
00073       long_nddl = getGraphName().str()+"."+short_nddl;
00074     // locate nddl model 
00075     //   - 1st look for <agent>.<reactor>.nddl
00076     nddl = manager().use(long_nddl, found);
00077     if( !found ) {
00078       // if not found look for jsut <reactor>.nddl
00079       nddl = manager().use(short_nddl, found);
00080       if( !found )
00081        // no model found for this reactor 
00082        throw ReactorException(*this, "Unable to locate \""+long_nddl+"\" or \""+
00083                             short_nddl+"\"");
00084     }
00085   }
00086   // Load the model
00087   if( !m_assembly.playTransaction(nddl) )
00088     throw ReactorException(*this, "model in "+nddl+" is inconsistent.");
00089   
00090   if( !m_assembly.plan_db()->isClosed() ) {
00091     syslog("WARN")<<"Plan Database is not closed:\n"
00092                 <<"\tClosing it now!!\n";
00093     m_assembly.plan_db()->close();
00094   }
00095 
00096   // Now load solver configuration 
00097   std::string solver_cfg = parse_attr<std::string>(xml_factory::node(arg), 
00098                                              "solverConfig");  
00099   if( solver_cfg.empty() )
00100     throw XmlError(xml_factory::node(arg), "solverConfig attribute is empty");
00101   DeliberationFilter::set_current(this);
00102   m_assembly.configure_solver(solver_cfg);
00103   // finally I identify the external end internal timelines
00104   std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId> objs;
00105   m_assembly.trex_timelines(objs);
00106   syslog()<<"Found "<<objs.size()<<" TREX timeline declarations";
00107   
00108   for(std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId>::const_iterator it=objs.begin(); 
00109       objs.end()!=it; ++it) {
00110     EUROPA::LabelStr name = (*it)->getName();
00111     Symbol trex_name(name.c_str()), mode_val;
00112     EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId mode = m_assembly.mode(*it);    
00113     if( !mode->isSpecified() ) 
00114       throw ReactorException(*this, 
00115                           "Mode of timeline "+trex_name.str()+" is not specified");
00116     else {
00117       EUROPA::DataTypeId type = mode->getDataType();
00118       mode_val = type->toString(mode->getSpecifiedValue());
00119     }
00120        
00121     if( Assembly::EXTERNAL_MODE==mode_val || Assembly::OBSERVE_MODE==mode_val ) 
00122       use(trex_name, Assembly::OBSERVE_MODE!=mode_val);      
00123     else if( Assembly::INTERNAL_MODE==mode_val ) {
00124       m_assembly.check_default(*it);
00125       provide(trex_name);
00126       if( !isInternal(trex_name) ) {
00127        // Formally it would be better to demote it as External
00128        // but for now we will just hide this timeline to the rest of the world
00129        syslog("WARN")<<"Unable to declare "<<trex_name<<" as Internal ...\n"
00130                     <<"\t making it Private.";
00131       } else 
00132         m_core.set_internal(*it); 
00133     } else if( Assembly::IGNORE_MODE==mode_val ) {
00134       m_assembly.ignore(*it);
00135     } else {
00136       // everything else is just private ...
00137       if( Assembly::PRIVATE_MODE!=mode_val ) 
00138        // should never happen
00139        syslog("WARN")<<"timeline "<<trex_name<<" mode \""<<mode_val<<"\" is unknown.\n"
00140                     <<"\tI'll assume it is Private.";
00141     }
00142   }
00143 }
00144 
00145 EuropaReactor::~EuropaReactor() {}
00146 
00147 bool EuropaReactor::in_scope(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00148   TREX::transaction::TICK 
00149     deadline = getCurrentTick()+getExecLatency()+getLookAhead();
00150   if( !m_assembly.ignored(tok) ) {
00151     EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain start_t = tok->start()->lastDomain(), 
00152       end_t = tok->end()->lastDomain();
00153     return end_t.getUpperBound() >= getCurrentTick() &&
00154       ( start_t.getUpperBound() < getFinalTick() ||
00155        start_t.getLowerBound() <=deadline );
00156   }
00157 }
00158 
00159 bool EuropaReactor::dispatch_window(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj, 
00160                                 TREX::transaction::TICK &from, 
00161                                 TREX::transaction::TICK &to) {
00162   TREX::utils::Symbol name(obj->getName().toString());
00163   external_iterator pos = find_external(name);
00164   if( pos.valid() && pos->accept_goals() ) {
00165     TREX::transaction::IntegerDomain window = pos->dispatch_window(getCurrentTick());
00166     TREX::transaction::IntegerDomain::bound 
00167       lo = window.lowerBound(), hi = window.upperBound();
00168     from = lo.value();
00169     if( hi.isInfinity() )
00170       to = getFinalTick();
00171     else
00172       to = hi.value();
00173     return true;
00174   }
00175   return false;
00176 }

00180 //  - TREX transaction callback 
00181 
00182 void EuropaReactor::notify(Observation const &o) {
00183   std::pair<EUROPA::ObjectId, EUROPA::TokenId> 
00184     ret = m_assembly.convert(o, true);
00185 
00186   if( ret.second.isId() ) {
00187     ret.second->start()->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(getCurrentTick(),
00188                                                         getCurrentTick()));
00189     ret.second->end()->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(getCurrentTick()+1,
00190                                                       PLUS_INFINITY));
00191     m_core.notify(ret);
00192   } else {
00193     syslog("ERROR")<<"Failed to produce observation "
00194                  <<o.object()<<'.'<<o.predicate()<<" inside europa model.";
00195   }
00196 }
00197 
00198 void EuropaReactor::handleRequest(goal_id const &g) {
00199   EUROPA::TokenId tok = m_assembly.convert(*g, false).second;
00200 
00201   if( tok.isId() ) {
00202     // restrict start, duration and end
00203     try {
00204       details::europa_restrict(tok->start(), g->getStart());
00205       details::europa_restrict(tok->duration(), g->getDuration());
00206       details::europa_restrict(tok->end(), g->getEnd());
00207     } catch(DomainExcept const &de) {
00208       syslog("ERROR")<<"Failed to restrict goal "<<g->object()<<'.'<<g->predicate()
00209                    <<'['<<g<<"] temporal attributes: "<<de;
00210       return;
00211     }
00212     m_internal_goals[tok->getKey()] = g;
00213     if( m_assembly.inactive() )
00214       m_assembly.mark_active();
00215   } else {
00216     syslog("WARN")<<"Ignored unknown goal "
00217                 <<g->object()<<'.'<<g->predicate();
00218   }
00219 }
00220 
00221 void EuropaReactor::handleRecall(goal_id const &g) {
00222   for(europa_mapping::iterator i=m_internal_goals.begin(); 
00223       m_internal_goals.end()!=i; ++i)
00224     if( i->second==g ) {
00225       EUROPA::eint key = i->first;
00226       m_internal_goals.erase(i);
00227 
00228       // Need to notify the europa solver
00229       m_core.recall(key);
00230       return;
00231     }
00232 }

00234 //  - TREX execution callbacks
00235 
00236 void EuropaReactor::handleInit() {
00237   // Now is the time to set my timing constants in the model
00238   EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId 
00239     mission_end = m_assembly.plan_db()->getGlobalVariable(Assembly::MISSION_END),
00240     tick_duration = m_assembly.plan_db()->getGlobalVariable(Assembly::TICK_DURATION);
00241   if( mission_end.isNoId() )
00242     throw ReactorException(*this, "Unable to locate "+Assembly::MISSION_END.toString()+
00243                         " in the model");
00244   if( tick_duration.isNoId() )
00245     throw ReactorException(*this, "Unable to locate "+Assembly::TICK_DURATION.toString()+
00246                         " in the model");
00247   mission_end->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(getFinalTick(), 
00248                                                      getFinalTick()));
00249   tick_duration->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(tickDuration(),
00250                                                        tickDuration()));
00251   
00252   // Next thing is to process facts
00253   m_core.initialize();
00254 }
00255 
00256 void EuropaReactor::handleTickStart() {
00257   if( getCurrentTick()==getInitialTick() )
00258     reset_deliberation();
00259   m_completedThisTick = false;
00260   TREX::transaction::TICK 
00261     deadline = getCurrentTick()+getExecLatency()+getLookAhead();
00262   
00263   m_filter->set_horizon(getCurrentTick(), std::min(getFinalTick(), deadline));
00264   m_core.doDispatch();
00265 }
00266 
00267 bool EuropaReactor::synchronize() {
00268   // m_filter->set_horizon(getCurrentTick(), getCurrentTick()+1);
00269   if( !( m_core.update_externals() && m_core.synchronize() ) ) {
00270     m_assembly.solver().reset();
00271     // doRecalls
00272     m_assembly.mark_inactive();
00273     if( !( m_core.relax(false) && m_core.synchronize()) ) {
00274       m_assembly.mark_inactive();
00275       if( !(m_core.relax(true) && m_core.synchronize()) ) {
00276         syslog()<<"Unable to explain the current state of the world.";
00277         return false;
00278       }
00279     }
00280   }
00281   // TREX::transaction::TICK 
00282   //   deadline = getCurrentTick()+getExecLatency()+getLookAhead();
00283   
00284   // m_filter->set_horizon(getCurrentTick(), std::min(getFinalTick(), deadline));
00285   m_core.doNotify();
00286   // m_core.archive();
00287   logPlan();
00288   return true;
00289 }
00290 
00291 bool EuropaReactor::hasWork() {
00292   if( m_assembly.invalid() )
00293     return false;
00294   if( m_assembly.active() )
00295     return true;
00296   return !m_completedThisTick;
00297 }
00298 
00299 void EuropaReactor::resume() {
00300   // syslog()<<"step "<<m_steps;
00301   if( m_assembly.invalid() ) {
00302     syslog("ERROR")<<"Cannot resume deliberation with an invalid database.";
00303     return;
00304   }
00305   if( m_assembly.solver().isExhausted() ) {
00306     syslog("WARN")<<"No plan found.";
00307     m_assembly.mark_invalid();
00308   }
00309   ++m_steps;
00310   m_core.step();
00311 }

00315 void EuropaReactor::removed(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00316   EUROPA::TokenId active = tok;
00317   if( tok->isMerged() )
00318     active = tok->getActiveToken();
00319   TICK end_time = EUROPA::cast_basis(active->end()->lastDomain().getUpperBound());
00320   int delay = getCurrentTick()-end_time;
00321 
00322   europa_mapping::iterator i = m_external_goals.find(active->getKey());
00323   if( m_external_goals.end()!=i ) {
00324     m_external_goals.erase(i);
00325   } else {
00326     i = m_internal_goals.find(tok->getKey());
00327     if( m_internal_goals.end()!=i ) {
00328       if( delay>0 ) 
00329        syslog("goals")<<"Request ["<<i->second<<"] completed ("<<delay
00330                      <<" ticks ago).";
00331       else
00332        syslog("goals")<<"Request ["<<i->second<<"] completed.";
00333       m_internal_goals.erase(i);
00334     }
00335   }
00336 }
00337 
00338 void EuropaReactor::request(EUROPA::ObjectId const &tl, 
00339                          EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00340   EUROPA::TokenId active = tok;
00341   if( tok->isMerged() )
00342     active = tok->getActiveToken();
00343 
00344   europa_mapping::iterator i = m_external_goals.find(active->getKey());
00345   if( m_external_goals.end()==i ) {
00346     TREX::utils::Symbol name(tl->getName().toString());
00347     Goal myGoal(name, tok->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString());
00348     
00349     goal_id request = postGoal(myGoal);
00350     if( request )
00351       m_external_goals[active->getKey()] = request;
00352   } 
00353 }
00354 
00355 void EuropaReactor::relax() {
00356   for(europa_mapping::const_iterator i=m_external_goals.begin();
00357       m_external_goals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00358     syslog("recall")<<"RECALL "<<i->second;
00359     postRecall(i->second);    
00360   }
00361   m_external_goals.clear();  
00362 }
00363 
00364 void EuropaReactor::recall(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00365   EUROPA::TokenId active = tok;
00366   if( tok->isMerged() )
00367     active = tok->getActiveToken();
00368 
00369   europa_mapping::iterator i = m_external_goals.find(active->getKey());
00370   if( m_external_goals.end()!=i ) {
00371     goal_id g = i->second;
00372     m_external_goals.erase(i);
00373     syslog("recall")<<"RECALL "<<i->second;
00374     postRecall(g);
00375   }
00376 }
00377 
00378 void EuropaReactor::notify(EUROPA::ObjectId const &tl, 
00379                         EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00380   Observation obs(tl->getName().c_str(), 
00381                 tok->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString());
00382   
00383   // populate the observation 
00384 
00385   postObservation(obs);
00386 }

00389 bool EuropaReactor::deactivate_solver() {
00390   m_assembly.solver().clear();
00391   return true;
00392 }
